title: PC 5 March - With regard to the Bologna event which rightly contested Pd and Mattia Santori
content:
OfBologna draftingcontropiano

Friday 1st March, a very participated and determined student procession crossed the streets of the center of Bologna.


So the students have "asked for the bill" to those of duty, symbolically sanctioning prefecture, Provveditorato e then rectorate.

But To shop the legitimate anger of the students who took to the streets is was also Mattia Santori, former sardine leader and now fond ofchild prodigyof the Democratic Party, which is harshly contested by two Students of Osa. Faced with the useless excuses, the councilor of the majority that governs the municipality has been faced with its own responsibility with respect to the pro-Israeli positions of his party.

«As a councilor of the Democratic Party there must not be, it is not welcome to the event»,, These are the words without appeal to Sartori, who thought probably to be able to exploit the event for their own political purposes.

An approach that did not like the local editorial staff of the newspaperThe Republicthat, in its versionon-line,Since the title, he chooses a sensationalist cut: "Student manifestation: firecrackers, paint on the policemen, burnt photos of Meloni and Netanyahu, insults to Sainors". Not exactly an example of great journalism, considering among other things who, always in the title, reports some delusional statements of the former Sardina, type "Lost opportunity, the fault of the infiltrators”.

And In fact, an opportunity was lost for the Democratic Party to make up for one political virginity. Those that Santori, like Pecchioli of the years Seventy, call "infiltrated" they are students and students who in a anything but easy situation they animate the collectives of the institutes and their most "politicized" part who is giving a beneficial shock to the lethargy of the city and of this Village.

Does not deviate muchThe rest of the CarlinoThat informs us that of the door of the Prefecture, against which they were Hare eggs with red paint cookering a accidentally "dirty" Manager of the Bolognese Digos, "The restoration had just been completed". What a stuff, countess ...

MaThe images and videos, reported by the same two newspapers,they speak clearly; as well as the objectives chosen by the students, whothey speak from themselves.

Santori Moreover, probably irritated for being invited to leaving, then launched himself in a river of statements according to which "The event launched by the student collectives has turned into an assist to those who professed violence" (!), making it known - as an old complement commission - that contents and ways of expressing them of the square receive from him "and by the institutions that represent a firm condemnation". Not that you could have some doubts, even before ...

IlGive anto which the students subjected the PD has thus become an element of indispensable political clarity, canceling that in the bud that attempt to recover the consensus that the spacked heads also during The Draghi government - against those who protested for the death of a student During the PCTO - they annihilated forever.

There in short, Bolognese event was an excellent prelude to the event to be held today in Pisa, and a fundamental stop for Who tries to build an opposition to the Meloni government for his Bellicist policy and the authoritarian torsion that is imprinting to village.

Bolognese students have not allowed "The enemy marched their heads”.
